name: BOOR
description: BOOR is a 2D puzzle-platformer game, where you play as a girl with the ability to multiply herself, stranded on Eden, a beautiful but strange world, full of challenging puzzles with platforming elements and a refreshing gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space
